% Scaling Analysis Table
\begin{table}[htbp]
  \centering
  \caption{Latency Scaling Analysis (Quadratic Fit: $aT^2 + bT + c$)}
  \label{tab:scaling}
  \begin{tabular}{lrrrl}
    \toprule
    Configuration & $a$ ($\times 10^{-3}$) & $b$ & $R^2$ & Scaling \\
    \midrule
    No Cache & 4.776 & 2.27 & 1.000 & $O(T^2)$ \\
    KV-Cache & 0.058 & 3.21 & 1.000 & $O(T^2)$ \\
    KV+INT8 & 0.061 & 6.53 & 1.000 & $O(T^2)$ \\
    KV+Share & 0.005 & 3.04 & 1.000 & $\approx O(T)$ \\
    KV+INT8+Share & 0.028 & 5.12 & 1.000 & $O(T^2)$ \\
    \bottomrule
  \end{tabular}
\end{table}
